attributes.action: Instead of paying benifits. Pay benifits for work around the community. Pay them to do the bins, cut the grass, tar the roads.
attributes.additional_details: Instead of paying benifits. Pay benifts for work around the community. Pay them to do the bins, cut the grass, tar the roads. Instead of paying them for nothing. Work all your lives and get nothing. Don't work and get everything. This must stop !
